generic-plugin.name: WebSphereServerPlugin
generic-plugin.description: Supports management and monitoring of WebSphere Application Server
generic-plugin.serverplugin:help: Automatically uninventories resources that have been removed from the WebSphere configuration.

c:simple-property.name: enabled
c:simple-property.description: Whether or not the job should be scheduled

c:simple-property.name: scheduleTrigger
c:simple-property.description: Based on the schedule type, this is either the period, in milliseconds, or the cron expression

c:simple-property.name: concurrent
c:simple-property.description: Whether or not the job can be run multiple times concurrently

c:simple-property.name: clustered
c:simple-property.description: Whether or not the job can be run on any machine in the server cluster. If false, it will always run on all machines where this plugin is deployed.
